HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznosa preko 200 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 do 7 radna dana. Vikendi i blagdani se ne uračunavaju u rok isporuke. U periodu od 15.06. do 15.08. moguća su kašnjenja u isporukama uređaja 2 do 3 radna dana.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava se vrši na području cijele Republike Hrvatske osim na otoke na koje dostavne službe ne dostavljaju. Isporuka na otoke se obavlja po planu dostavljača u roku do 10 radnih dana.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznosa preko 200 €.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 do 7 radna dana. Isporuka na otoke se obavlja po planu dostavljača u roku do 10 radnih dana. U periodu od 15.06. do 15.08. moguća su kašnjenja u isporukama uređaja 2 do 3 radna dana.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava se vrši na području cijele Republike Hrvatske osim na otoke na koje dostavne službe ne dostavljaju. Rok isporuke na otoke je do 10 radnih dana.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Preuzimanje se ne može obaviti na dan plaćanja.

weekend_delivery.days: Radno vrijeme: ponedjeljak - petak od 8 do 16 sati.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery across Croatia and in-store pickup in Split are available. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not offered.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Overseas Express, LagerMax, and DPD.
PRICING: Home delivery is free for all orders over 200 €. In-store pickup is free. Pricing for orders under the free shipping threshold is not specified.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is available to most of Croatia, but excludes some islands where couriers do not operate. Delivery to islands takes longer, up to 10 working days. Weekend delivery is not available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free delivery applies to the entire product range, which primarily consists of bulky items like air conditioners. There is a clear policy for handling damaged goods upon receipt. In-store pickup requires prior arrangement as items are not immediately available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-detailed on a dedicated page, covering costs, delivery times, providers, and island delivery specifics. However, it lacks information on cash-on-delivery (COD), express options, and the cost for orders below the free shipping threshold.
